captions.text: SooZee what are we doing?
We're actually in the YouTube Music Awards
So, Simon and Martina are going to the rehearsals
So we're rehearsing right now Simon, Martina, Taecyeon.
Taecyeon is looking more feminine.
I expected him to be more masculine
since last time I saw him.
But... Oh but I like his hair color.
We have a studio at Hongdae, we have our crew.
Behind you right there.
Yeah, the ones behind us.
Look.
It's the Simon and Martina tent.
It's going to be really lame.
When we go out there for the photo
And there's like two flashes from everybody else.
That's exactly what will be happening.
Can you have them do like a normal pose?
[L]They don't do normal very well.
I don't know whose water it is, I'm just going to drink this while no one sees.
Who has herpes here?
At least got two hands up.
Simon and Martina please say hello to your fans
Hi I'm Simon
And I'm Martina
We're from eatyourkimchi
And we're here backstage in Seoul in YouTube Music Awards
Where anything can happen
And by "anything" we mean... Interviews
[M] Interviews.
[T]Wow... I'm scared...
[S] You should be.
So we just finished our first interview with SungHa
We're going out to our 2nd interview with MissA right now.
Yes. And we're in the backroom again as usual
Hanging out with the EYK additional crew
I that G hiding in the corner?
G is charging his phone
And so we're really nervous and I found out that my dress
might have been provocative.
And I might have been showing the world my... Cookie!
We're sad because Sistar had to leave right before our interview
Even though we had it all planned out and written in the cue cards
[Kris] Simon and Martina. Simon! Martina! [Taecyeon]Are you guys there?
Hi~
You're looking for Min? We're here with Min and the rest of Miss A as well.
We actually stole Min when you weren't paying attention
I put her in the back-pack and I ran back here and now she's here with us.
Yes, here I am.
She's very light and fluffy.
Annyeonghaseyo
Like an airplane hanger.
[Soozee] Um... Martina, we have to go.
We have to really go.
It's my Bucheon Yeongeo students

title: Backstage at the YTMA with Taecyeon, Kris, Miss A, and SHINee
